title: Patch 7.4 Crashes My Computer
body: My issue is similar to those described in the 5.5. Every time I try to login and launch the game my computer freezes. I have tried reinstalling the game, however, while trying to install it after deleting it a 2nd time it crashed my computer and when I try to install it, it crashes my computer.

replies.body:
Hmmmmmm if your entire pc is shutting down when you try to launch league, there's a chance that's it's your computer's way of protecting itself from overheating. 

There's a number of different hardware issues that could cause overheating, so we'll need to take a closer look to see what's going on. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can help troubleshoot that for you.
